com.ps.server.Logic.Pieces

Class Piece

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ps.server.Logic.Pieces.Piece
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bishop, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook

extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Detail

      • color

        public final Color color
        piece color: WHITE, BLACK

      • type

        public final Piece.PieceType type
        piece type: KING, QUEEN, KNIGHT, BISHOP, ROOK, PAWN

    • Method Detail

      • addBoard

        public void addBoard(Board board)
        Adds reference to board on witch the piece stands. Later on piece will use the state on board to know where it can move.
        Parameters:
        board - reference to board

      • semiLegalMoves

        public abstract java.util.List<Move> semiLegalMoves()
        Generates and returns list of semi legal moves. Semi legal moves are all moves that a piece can make ignoring kings state (if king under capture) after the move
        Returns:
        list of semi legal moves

      • update

        public void update()
        Generates and saves all legal moves it can make. Legal moves are all possible moves that don't put king under capture.

      • checkIfCanCaptureKingOn

        public abstract boolean checkIfCanCaptureKingOn(Position kingsPosition)
        Checks if piece can capture king on given position (has semi legal move on this position)
        Parameters:
        kingsPosition - kings position
        Returns:
        true if king under this piece capture

      • copy

        public abstract Piece copy()
        Makes copy of the piece. Copies its color, position and type but not reference to board
        Returns:
        copy of the piece

      • getPosition

        public Position getPosition()
        Returns position of the piece on the board (in bounds: row: 0-7 and column: 0-7)
        Returns:
        position

      • move

        public void move(Position position)
        Changes position of the piece on the board (in bounds: row: 0-7 and column: 0-7)
        Parameters:
        position - new position

      • getMoveTo

        public Move getMoveTo(Position dest)
        Returns:
        an instance of Move to given destination, if there is no legal move to this destination returns null

      • canMove

        public boolean canMove()
        Returns:
        true if list of pre saved legal moves is not empty

      • giveEnPassantRights

        public void giveEnPassantRights(Position position)
        Gives en passant rights to capture pawn on specified position. Rights are only saved by piece of type pawn and will be withdrawn after next update on piece.
        Parameters:
        position - of the pawn to be captured by en passant

      • getListOfMoves

        public java.util.List<Move> getListOfMoves()
        Returns the list of pre saved legal moves. The moves need to be generated by update method first.
        Returns:
        list of legal moves

      • getType

        public Piece.PieceType getType()
        Returns:
        piece type: KING, QUEEN, KNIGHT, BISHOP, ROOK, PAWN

      • createPiece

        public static Piece createPiece(Piece.PieceType type,
                                Position position,
                                Color color)
        Creates new piece.
        Parameters:
        type - piece type (KING, QUEEN, KNIGHT, BISHOP, ROOK, PAWN), instance the according class will be created
        position - on board, where the piece stands (should be in bounds row: 0-7, column: 0-7)
        color - specifies the color of chess piece (WHITE or BLACK)
        Returns:
        created piece
